greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x^5) / ((1 - x) * (1 - x^4)) in powers of x.
comment: The sequence A107453 has the same terms but different offset.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2) = 1, a(2^e) = 2 if e>1, a(p^e) = 1 if p>2.
a(-n) = a(n). a(n+4) = a(n) unless n=0 or n=-4.
a(n) = (i^n + (-i)^n + (-1)^n + 5)/4 for n > 0 where i is the imaginary unit. - _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 25 2011
program: (MAGMA) m:=100; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!((1+x+x^2+x^3+x^4)/(1-x^4))); // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 22 2018
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 10 2009
